name: Kunnect
description: Kunnect is a Tier-2 class carrier and an on-demand, hosted call center service provider that manages about 6 billion calls a year through its best-in-class hosted solution, worldwide.It provides customer contact businesses with unattended inbound/outbound IVR solutions and ACD queue, Auto-attendant, Predictive and Preview Dialer call center solutions in a hosted, subscription-based service model.
